spec_data.Name: php-horde-Horde-Role
spec_data.Description:
This package provides a method for PEAR to install Horde components into
the base Horde installation.

System default Horde installation directory is /usr/share/horde.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 07:59:16 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: PEAR installer role used to install Horde components
